Html:
I want to install prism and unity http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=3453ab2b-2067-41e4-b087-312d8385cf1b&displaylang=en

silverlight 4 vs 2010 sp1

anything else I need to install besides unity prism 

WHat is the purpose of the microsoft enterprise library 5?

 http://mef.codeplex.com/releases/view/61730#ReviewsAnchor

also is the right version to download for mef silverlight 4 ??

Hi,

Either if you want to use MEF or Unity, you don't need to download anything else than the Prism release that you've pointed.

Regarding EntLib, you might find the following pages useful:

  • Microsoft Enterprise Library
  • Microsoft Enterprise Library - Codeplex

From the first link, "The Microsoft Enterprise Library is a collection of reusable software components (application blocks) designed to assist software developers with common enterprise development cross-cutting concerns (such as logging, validation, data access, exception handling, and many others). Application blocks are a type of guidance; they are provided as source code, test cases, and documentation that can be used "as is," extended, or modified by developers to use on complex, enterprise-level line-of-business development projects."

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
